mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BasicInfoBooks (Number, CategoryNumber, Name, Author, Translator, Press, Price, PublicationTime,Total,Surplus) VALUES (#{number}, #{categoryNumber}, #{name},#{author}, #{translator}, #{press}, #{price}, #{publicationTime},#{total},#{surplus})
mapper.update: UPDATE BasicInfoBooks SET Number = #{number}, CategoryNumber = #{categoryNumber}, Name = #{name}, Author = #{author}, Translator = #{translator}, Press = #{press}, Price = #{price}, PublicationTime = #{publicationTime}, Total = #{total}, Surplus = #{surplus} WHERE Id = #{id}
UPDATE BasicInfoBooks SET Total = Total + 1, Surplus = Surplus + 1 WHERE Number = #{number}
UPDATE BasicInfoBooks SET Surplus = Surplus + (#{quantity}) WHERE Number = #{number}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BasicInfoBooks WHERE Number = #{number} AND Id != #{id}

SELECT * FROM BasicInfoBooks
AND Name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
AND Number LIKE "%"#{number}"%"
AND CategoryNumber LIKE "%"#{categoryNumber}"%"
LIMIT #{start}, #{page.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BasicInfoBooks
AND Name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"
AND Number LIKE "%"#{number}"%"
AND CategoryNumber LIKE "%"#{categoryNumber}"%"
